ComicInfo.Summary: MAD's annual review of the dumbest people, events and things of the year takes aim at Janet Jackson, Donald Trump, Dan Rather, Britney Spears, Donald Rumsfeld, Ashlee Simpson, William Hung, Lindsay Lohan and many more! Plus, MAD presses charges against Law & Order: Criminal Intent!
